display_long_description:
Immortalize the chunkiest, cutest birds you’ve ever seen with Birdseed’s in-game camera, meant to feel just like you’re holding the real thing. **Aim, shoot, print and record** the birds you’ve found in your Journal and work on getting that perfect 3 star shot!

[media]

The birds and bird sounds of Birdseed are all based on their real life counterparts. Step into a **cozy forest setting** and let the nature sounds wrap you up in a warm hug!

[media]

Wish you could share that perfect shot with your friends? The **social multiplayer** in Birdseed is designed for maximum coziness - share photos, track your best scores, and chat while you enjoy the simple act of birdwatching together.

[media]

**What to expect in Early Access**

Birdseed VR welcomes you to play this early preview of the game! We'll be rolling out updates during this period leading up to launch, including (but not limited to!):
- Field Guides to unlock new birds
- New equipment like telephoto lenses
- Scout's Store to purchase new decorative skins and more
- Social sharing to send your photos to friends and followers!
- Multiplayer mode to enjoy birding with your friends!

Be part of this early preview of the game to have your voice heard throughout the game’s production and see how the hobby of birdwatching will come to life in VR!

[media]

**What to expect in Early Access**

Birdseed VR welcomes you to play this early preview of the game! We'll be rolling out updates during this period leading up to launch, including (but not limited to!):
- Field Guides to unlock new birds
- New equipment like telephoto lenses
- Scout's Store to purchase new decorative skins and more
- Social sharing to send your photos to friends and followers!
- Multiplayer mode to enjoy birding with your friends!

Be part of this early preview of the game to have your voice heard throughout the game’s production and see how the hobby of birdwatching will come to life in VR!
